item.description:
Working out of the many paint technique books I have, I'm going to choose exercises to work on and paint.  I'll be channeling different exercises from the books such as "Painter's Wild Workshop," "Painting Abstracts," "Creative Paint Workshop for Mixed Media Artists," and "Art & Quilt: Design Principles and Creativity Exercises."

These are going to be ongoing twice weekly, in the evenings, open studios. Pat and I are aiming for Monday/Thursday evenings, but if there are other nights that work better, just let me know.

You may work on anything you want to, but if you're interested in putting paint on canvas, come and join us!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Open Studio with a painting theme
